mapper.select: SELECT seek.id, sequence, seek_type, miss_name, gender, birthdate, miss_date, miss_detail_place, feature, plot, seek_subtype, contact_name, relationship, contact_tel, contact_wechat, contact_QQ, contact_address, extra_tel, other_information, title, pubdate, GROUP_CONCAT(seek_img.url SEPARATOR ',') AS seekimgs, bp.province_name AS birth_province_name, bc.city_name AS birth_city_name, boy.county_name AS birth_county_name, mp.province_name AS miss_province_name, mc.city_name AS miss_city_name, my.county_name AS miss_county_name FROM seek LEFT JOIN seek_img ON seek.id=seek_img.seek_id LEFT JOIN province bp ON seek.birth_province_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN city bc ON seek.birth_city_id=bc.id LEFT JOIN county boy ON seek.birth_county_id=boy.id LEFT JOIN province mp ON seek.miss_province_id=mp.id LEFT JOIN city mc ON seek.miss_city_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN county my ON seek.miss_county_id=my.id where seek.id=#{id} GROUP BY seek.id, sequence, seek_type, miss_name, gender, birthdate, miss_date, miss_detail_place, feature, plot, seek_subtype, contact_name, relationship, contact_tel, contact_wechat, contact_QQ, contact_address, extra_tel, title, pubdate, birth_province_name, birth_city_name, birth_county_name, miss_province_name, miss_city_name, miss_county_name

SELECT seek.id, sequence, seek_type, miss_name, gender, birthdate, miss_date, miss_detail_place, feature, plot, seek_subtype, contact_name, relationship, contact_tel, contact_wechat, contact_QQ, contact_address, extra_tel, title, other_information, pubdate, GROUP_CONCAT(seek_img.url SEPARATOR ',') AS seekimgs, bp.province_name AS birth_province_name, bc.city_name AS birth_city_name, boy.county_name AS birth_county_name, mp.province_name AS miss_province_name, mc.city_name AS miss_city_name, my.county_name AS miss_county_name FROM seek LEFT JOIN seek_img ON seek.id=seek_img.seek_id LEFT JOIN province bp ON seek.birth_province_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN city bc ON seek.birth_city_id=bc.id LEFT JOIN county boy ON seek.birth_county_id=boy.id LEFT JOIN province mp ON seek.miss_province_id=mp.id LEFT JOIN city mc ON seek.miss_city_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN county my ON seek.miss_county_id=my.id where seek.customer_id=#{customerId} GROUP BY seek.id, sequence, seek_type, miss_name, gender, birthdate, miss_date, miss_detail_place, feature, plot, seek_subtype, contact_name, relationship, contact_tel, contact_wechat, contact_QQ, contact_address, extra_tel, title, pubdate, birth_province_name, birth_city_name, birth_county_name, miss_province_name, miss_city_name, miss_county_name LIMIT ${(currentPageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM seek where customer_id=#{customerId};
mapper.update: update seek set sequence=#{sequence}, seek_type=#{seekType}, miss_name=#{missName}, gender=#{gender}, birthdate=#{birthdate}, miss_date=#{missDate}, miss_detail_place=#{missDetailPlace}, feature=#{feature}, plot=#{plot}, seek_subtype=#{seekSubtype}, contact_name=#{contactName}, relationship=#{relationship}, contact_tel=#{contactTel}, contact_wechat=#{contactWechat}, contact_QQ=#{contactQQ}, contact_address=#{contactAddress}, extra_tel=#{extraTel}, seekimgs=#{seekimgs}, title=#{title}, pubdate=#{pubdate}, other_information=#{otherInformation} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT seek.*, bp.province_name AS birth_province_name, bc.city_name AS birth_city_name, boy.county_name AS birth_county_name, mp.province_name AS miss_province_name, mc.city_name AS miss_city_name, my.county_name AS miss_county_name FROM seek LEFT JOIN province bp ON seek.birth_province_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN city bc ON seek.birth_city_id=bc.id LEFT JOIN county boy ON seek.birth_county_id=boy.id LEFT JOIN province mp ON seek.miss_province_id=mp.id LEFT JOIN city mc ON seek.miss_city_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN county my ON seek.miss_county_id=my.id WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND seek_type = #{seekType};

SELECT seek.*, GROUP_CONCAT(seek_img.url SEPARATOR ',') AS seekimgs, bp.province_name AS birth_province_name, bc.city_name AS birth_city_name, boy.county_name AS birth_county_name, mp.province_name AS miss_province_name, mc.city_name AS miss_city_name, my.county_name AS miss_county_name FROM seek LEFT JOIN seek_img ON seek.id=seek_img.seek_id LEFT JOIN province bp ON seek.birth_province_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN city bc ON seek.birth_city_id=bc.id LEFT JOIN county boy ON seek.birth_county_id=boy.id LEFT JOIN province mp ON seek.miss_province_id=mp.id LEFT JOIN city mc ON seek.miss_city_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN county my ON seek.miss_county_id=my.id WHERE 1=1 AND seek.seek_type != #{seek.seekType} AND ( seek.birth_province_id = #{seek.address.birthProvinceId} OR seek.miss_province_id = #{seek.address.missProvinceId} ) GROUP BY seek.id, sequence, seek_type, miss_name, gender, birthdate, miss_date, miss_detail_place, feature, plot, seek_subtype, contact_name, relationship, contact_tel, contact_wechat, contact_QQ, contact_address, extra_tel, title, pubdate, birth_province_name, birth_city_name, birth_county_name, miss_province_name, miss_city_name, miss_county_name
